languages.text: Когда я замечаю Жертву, я с удовлетворением замечаю первые следы действия моего боевого токсина. Ее движения замедленны, а глаза моргают слишком часто — сейчас перед ними плавают пятна.

When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to note the early signs of the effect my combat toxin is having on it. Its movements are slowed and it is blinking often — spots are floating in front of its eyes by now.
languages.original_text: Когда я замечаю Жертву, я с удовлетворением замечаю первые следы действия моего боевого токсина. Ее движения замедленны, а глаза моргают слишком часто — сейчас перед ними плавают пятна.

traits.locale_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to notice the early signs of the effect of my combat toxin. Its movements are slowed, and its eyes are blinking too often — there are now spots floating in front of them.
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to notice the early signs of the effect of my combat toxin. Its movements are slowed, and its eyes are blinking too often — there are now spots floating in front of them.
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to note the early signs of the effect my combat toxin is having on it. Its movements are slowed and it is blinking often — spots are floating in front of its eyes by now.

traits.locale_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to note the early signs of the effect my combat toxin is having on it. Its movements are slowed and it is blinking often — spots are floating in front of its eyes by now.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 獲物を見つけたとき、私は戦闘用毒素による初期症状が獲物に見られることに気づいて喜んだ。動きが鈍くなり、まばたきが多くなっている。目の前には斑点が浮かんでいる。
languages.original_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to note the early signs of the effect my combat toxin is having on it. Its movements are slowed and it is blinking often — spots are floating in front of its eyes by now.

traits.locale_text: 獲物を見つけたとき、私は戦闘用毒素による初期症状が獲物に見られることに気づいて喜んだ。動きが鈍くなり、まばたきが多くなっている。目の前には斑点が浮かんでいる。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 当我看着猎物时，我很高兴地注意到，它的身上已经出现了毒药的早期迹象。它的动作变得迟缓，眼睛也在频繁地眨动。它的视野应该已经开始变花了。
languages.original_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to note the early signs of the effect my combat toxin is having on it. Its movements are slowed and it is blinking often — spots are floating in front of its eyes by now.

traits.locale_text: 当我看着猎物时，我很高兴地注意到，它的身上已经出现了毒药的早期迹象。它的动作变得迟缓，眼睛也在频繁地眨动。它应该已经看到漂浮在空中的斑点了。
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Cuando localizo a la presa, me complace notar los primeros síntomas del efecto de mi toxina de batalla. Sus movimientos son más lentos y sus ojos parpadean con frecuencia. A estas alturas, verá manchas flotando.
languages.original_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to note the early signs of the effect my combat toxin is having on it. Its movements are slowed and it is blinking often — spots are floating in front of its eyes by now.

traits.locale_text: Cuando localizo a la presa, me complace notar los primeros síntomas del efecto de mi toxina de batalla. Sus movimientos son más lentos y sus ojos parpadean con demasiada frecuencia. Ahora hay manchas flotando delante de ellos.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Als ich die Beute erblicke, nehme ich erfreut die ersten Anzeichen wahr, dass mein Kampftoxin zu wirken beginnt. Ihre Bewegungen werden langsamer und sie zwinkert ständig ... inzwischen trüben schwarze Punkte ihren Blick.
languages.original_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to note the early signs of the effect my combat toxin is having on it. Its movements are slowed and it is blinking often — spots are floating in front of its eyes by now.

traits.locale_text: Als ich die Beute erblicke, nehme ich erfreut die ersten Anzeichen wahr, dass mein Kampftoxin zu wirken beginnt. Ihre Bewegungen sind verlangsamt, ihre Augen blinzeln zu oft. Es schweben nun Punkte vor ihnen.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Quand enfin je repère ma proie, je me réjouis de voir que ma toxine commence à faire effet : elle a perdu en vivacité et cligne souvent des yeux, signe que sa vision décline.
languages.original_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to note the early signs of the effect my combat toxin is having on it. Its movements are slowed and it is blinking often — spots are floating in front of its eyes by now.

traits.locale_text: Quand enfin je repère ma proie, je me réjouis de voir que ma toxine a commencé à faire effet : elle a perdu en vivacité et cligne bien trop souvent des yeux, signe que sa vision décline.
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: Avımı tespit ediyorum. Zehrin etki ettiğine dair ilk izleri görmek, beni hoşnut ediyor. Hareketleri yavaşlamış durumda ve sıklıkla göz kırpıyor. Gözlerinin önünde şimdiden noktalar uçuşuyor.
languages.original_text: When I spot the Prey, I am pleased to note the early signs of the effect my combat toxin is having on it. Its movements are slowed and it is blinking often — spots are floating in front of its eyes by now.

traits.locale_text: Av'ı tespit ettiğimde, çatışma zehrinin üzerindeki erken etkilerini görmek beni hoşnut etti. Hareketleri yavaşlamış durumda ve sıklıkla göz kırpıyor. Gözlerinin önünde şimdiden noktalar uçuşuyor.
traits.speaker: Player
